original_text: The soldiers also laughed at him. They came up to him and they offered him cheap wine to drink.
korean_text: 군인들도 희롱하면서 나아와 신 포도주를 주며

sentences.original_text: The soldiers also laughed at him.
and they offered him cheap wine to drink.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그에게 마실 싸구포 포도주를 바쳤다.
